content: hugs 2020 is a free **overlay mosaic crochet** square design *because at the end of this year we all need a hug * --------------------------------------------------------------------- please note this listing is for a chart only and it does not include my usual detailed written instructions --------------------------------------------------------------------- you can use any yarn you wish for this but will need 2 contrasting colours just make sure both colours are a similar weight use a hook size appropriate to the yarn i used deramores studio dk with a 4mm hook and used approximately 20g each in burnt orange and wine excluding the border the video tutorial for the square is now available at https //youtu be/hjfyzxmdlq4 video tutorial for border is now available at https //youtu be/9q_i_t8r7ya for support please join my facebook group rosina crochets 1 1 https //www facebook com/groups/rosinacrochets
